refnamediv.refpurpose: run the &A; cleanup process after a failure

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Amcleanup generates the &A; Mail Report and updates the &A; databases after a system failure on a tape server host. This cleanup process is normally done automatically as part of the amdump program, but if amdump cannot complete for some reason (usually because of a tape server host crash), amcleanup must be run some time later (usually during system boot).
See the amanda8 man page for more details about &A;.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLES

Putting the following line in a system boot script (e.g. /etc/rc.local) runs the &A; cleanup process as part of the reboot, eliminating the need to run it by hand.
